name: The Night Crawlers (Demo)
description:
The Night Crawlers (Demo)

This is a Demo of 'The Night Crawlers' game that I am making.    This game will  involve many different creatures and this is my first creature 'The Cat Creeper'.    Cat Creeper was spotted in the woods 1977 and 3 people went missing.    He got captured and was being tested on.   He escaped,  and now in this demo it's 1978.   You are the only survivor and need to find items and keys to escape your death...   

 *Please join my YouTube Channel  - Dr.Goldie  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCV9nbUcHbdQSb1GiDgfygiA

Feel free to like, comment and share this game.

Thank-you for playing 

Sam

Thank you for copyright free  music
